name: places/ChIJg2N9qf33wokRAXsb-RfuW5g
formattedAddress: 148 W 125th St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 148 W 125th St, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
I went in less than a week ago to get four piercings, two additional lobe piercings on each ear. Below details my experience.

1. The person who pierced my ears never introduced himself. I have no idea what his name is.

2. He took less than two minutes to do the marks on both ears, marking one ear with much larger circles than the other ear. I noticed that they didn't look even and asked the guy if he was sure they were. He told me they were even; the circles were just bigger on one side. The second piercings were not even (see below). The difference is not very large, but it's quite noticeable to me and even made cleaning the piercings on my left side difficult. I realized I should've asked him to redo the circles, but the larger circle did cover where the correct place was.

3. He gave no warning when doing any of the piercings. Not even an, "Okay, I'm going to start now," for the first one. He also didn't ask if I was doing okay at any point in time.

4. He dropped one of the backs for the earrings. He picked it up from the floor with gloves on and only sanitized the earring back. He didn't change or sanitize the gloves. I should've said something, but I also don't think I should have to.

5. No aftercare instructions were given. Maybe it was because I already had piercings, but I wasn't given anything verbally or in written form. He showed me my new piercings in a mirror. When I asked if I was done, he affirmed, and that was that.

6. This is likely to vary shop by shop, but below you'll see the earring I was given from my very first piercings (silver) and this most recent one (gold). There is a lot more space to allow for swelling of the lobe on the silver one compared to the gold one.

7. I made an appointment via the website, and there was no follow up regarding the appointment even though I wasn't given an option to indicate what I wanted done or who I wanted to schedule with. I see a lot of the reviews around piercings talk about someone named Hannah. I don't think she was there nor the owner, who, according to the website, specializes in piercings.

The positives are that the piercings themselves were not expensive, and the first set of piercings look pretty even. However, for my experience, there was an extreme lack of customer service on top of one of the piercings not being done well. I have already taken the piercing out and will be getting it re-pierced somewhere else once it's healed.

originalText.text:
This is a long overdue review. I found this shop when I moved back to NY 2 years ago and have been my go to ever since. I bring my friends here as well to get piercings. Since I‚Äôve been back they have done 5 of my piercings and I brought 4 - 6 different people here. The staff is very friendly, acknowledgeable on their skills. This is  family oriented business. King cares about his staff. I have seen him teaching his staff on slower days to better their skills, and I have also seen a packed shop on Kings day off. I even come here to change out my jewelry because I can never unscrew them myself. Everyone here is amazing. I trust anyone to here to do my piercings. ü´∂üèæ

The shop is all the way in the back of what looks like a sneaker store(next to the museum under construction), pass the wall of oils.

originalText.text: Called in on august 11 2023 to get me and my sons ears pierced. First off (king) The Owner is mad cool and gave us the best price. The women that pierced our ears was very professional and informative, But most of all made us feel comfortable. Definitely recommend This Shop!

originalText.text: I travel from queens to come here. Ive been coming here for all my tattoos ever since i‚Äôve discovered them. not only for their good prices but also amazing artwork. i always go for cheeze but all the artists are talented. it is a small shop though but they are really amazing and comforting.

originalText.text: King is the man! Created a stencil from my design on the spot and did the tattoo super quickly and precisely. I am very happy with the result. My tattoo came out super clean and is healing raally well. I love my tattoo‚ù£Ô∏èGood job king üëç
